name: Coordinated Change Indicator
title: CCI
definition: Identifies this request is a Coordinated Change Activity to an existing access service.
usageNotes: Optional when the first position of the REQTYP   field is “E’’ “L” “M” “S’’ “V” or “X”  and the ACT   field is  “N” “C” “D” “T” or “M” otherwise   prohibited.
